name: NSPasteboard.Name
desc: Constants that represent the standard pasteboard names.

items.name: static let drag: NSPasteboard.Name
items.desc: The pasteboard that stores data to move as the result of a drag operation.

items.name: static let find: NSPasteboard.Name
items.desc: The pasteboard that holds information about the current state of the active applicationâ€™s find panel.

items.name: static let font: NSPasteboard.Name
items.desc: The pasteboard that holds font and character information and supports Copy Font and Paste Font commands that the text editor may implement.

items.name: static let general: NSPasteboard.Name
items.desc: The pasteboard you use to perform ordinary cut, copy, and paste operations.

items.name: static let ruler: NSPasteboard.Name
items.desc: The pasteboard that holds information about paragraph formats and supports the Copy Ruler and Paste Ruler commands that the text editor may implement.
